about_the_game:
ADA: Tainted Soil is a story-driven adventure filled with unique characters and their own storylines. In this top-down action RPG with fast-paced combat, you’ll fight your way through hordes of diverse enemies with unique behavior and design. Be prepared to explore a vast, cruel world crafted pixel by pixel with passion and love. You’ll unlock and upgrade skills, equip your favorite ones, and forge your character. On your journey, you’ll brew potions and other powerful consumables, and forage land for ingredients to combine them. Remember always to be prepared, as the world around you constantly changes. You never know what you will run into, be it at night or daytime.



"I could swear I knew that forest, but so many things have changed"


The vast and cruel world of Ada is waiting for you to explore. You can choose whichever path you want as long as you can fight your way through encountered enemies. Find all secrets scattered across the land and water, and use the fast travel option to speed up your journey. Find your own way on your journey through carefully handcrafted and designed zones.

"Sometimes dodging is essential"


Combat in Ada is based on a combination of a basic attack routine with a secondary skill of your choice and potions/consumables. Every fight could end well with proper movement and dodging. Be prepared, observe, adapt, and survive.

Enemies in Ada are carefully designed to bring the highest amount of fair difficulty to the game. They are unique both visually and mechanically. Some will attack you alone with big combos or swings, and others will be fast, agile, and evade your attack, while others may group up to get you with numbers. Prepare for epic encounters with main and side bosses that fit the zone you are exploring.

"I should have never entered these ruins"


You'll meet Ada, and as much as you'd want her to have an everyday, happy life, it's not possible in this land, at this time, in this world. Any job would be better than that, but there's no other one for you...

Immerse yourself in a story brimming with mystery and the pangs of solitude. This land is a place of constant surprises, where nothing is as it seems, and everything is a departure from your memories. Engage with the characters, delve into their storylines, and embark on quests. Each one is a unique tale with its own distinct character and appearance.

Traces of the land's history, rich and diverse, can be discovered strewn along your path. Whether in the form of paintings or vivid flashbacks, they reveal ancient battles, transforming dilapidated ruins into majestic castles, or significant historical events that shaped the world you now explore.

"It always amazes me how leaves, roots, and blood of a rodent turn into weapons of mass destruction."


Use alchemy to create valuable potions and heal or boost your abilities. Your mixtures can also be thrown at enemies to harm, confuse, stun, or even turn them against each other. Collect herbs, crystals, vials, and other ingredients to create powerful potions. Each comes in different sizes, and the bigger the size, the stronger the explosion.

Potions can also help interact with the environment, burning things down or freezing the water. Who knows what that might mean for you and your exploration of the world of Ada...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step into the world of Ada, a story-driven single-player 2D top-down action RPG with fast-paced combat and stunning visuals to enjoy. Combine different weapons, spells, and skills to overcome all obstacles in your way. Be prepared for the unexpected.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
